4265.verse: ۞ إِلَيْهِ|To Him|98|105|296$يُرَدُّ|is referred|87|102|6151$عِلْمُ|(the) knowledge|128|143|9511$ٱلسَّاعَةِ‌ۚ|(of) the Hour.|112|127|7045$وَمَا|And not|72|87|46$تَخْرُجُ|comes out|89|104|10612$مِن|any|50|57|53$ثَمَرَٲتٍ|fruits|87|97|14384$مِّنْ|from|50|69|53$أَكْمَامِهَا|their coverings,|123|142|15323$وَمَا|and not|71|90|46$تَحْمِلُ|bears|74|93|9350$مِنْ|any|50|69|53$أُنثَىٰ|female|63|82|2791$وَلَا|and not|71|81|25$تَضَعُ|gives birth|89|96|14355$إِلَّا|except|65|78|86$بِعِلْمِهِۦ‌ۚ|with His knowledge.|151|164|4658$وَيَوْمَ|And (the) Day|114|127|819$يُنَادِيهِمْ|He will call them,|132|145|13501$أَيْنَ|`Where (are)|108|115|5492$شُرَكَآءِى|My partners?`|114|128|15324$قَالُوٓاْ|They will say,|111|139|101$ءَاذَنَّـٰكَ|`We announce (to) You,|184|212|15325$مَا|not|42|70|262$مِنَّا|among us|83|111|1169$مِن|any|50|64|53$شَهِيدٍ|witness.`|83|83|15326$

4266.verse: وَضَلَّ|And lost|77|101|5499$عَنْهُم|from them|87|135|2643$مَّا|what|53|101|262$كَانُواْ|they were|87|135|94$يَدْعُونَ|invoking|87|135|1942$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before,|92|116|250$وَظَنُّواْ|and they (will) be certain|188|206|6985$مَا|(that) not|87|123|262$لَهُم|for them|76|112|98$مِّن|any|50|86|53$مَّحِيصٍ|place of escape.|130|148|9583$

4268.verse: وَلَئِنْ|And verily, if|103|118|1309$أَذَقْنَـٰهُ|We let him taste|130|160|8388$رَحْمَةً|mercy|78|108|2636$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|100|1169$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|121|280$ضَرَّآءَ|an adversity|102|117|8067$مَسَّتْهُ|(has) touched him,|146|160|8390$لَيَقُولَنَّ|he will surely say,|138|166|4178$هَـٰذَا|`This (is)|82|110|248$لِى|due to me|87|115|1351$وَمَآ|and not|71|99|46$أَظُنُّ|I think|63|77|10770$ٱلسَّاعَةَ|the Hour|87|96|9836$قَآئِمَةً|(will be) established,|157|175|10772$وَلَئِن|and if|66|84|1309$رُّجِعْتُ|I am returned|110|128|15330$إِلَىٰ|to|53|71|118$رَبِّىٓ|my Lord,|77|95|2902$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|77|58$لِى|for me|62|69|1351$عِندَهُۥ|with Him|80|95|1264$لَلْحُسْنَىٰ‌ۚ|(will be) the best.`|147|162|15331$فَلَنُنَبِّئَنَّ|But We will surely inform|182|197|15332$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|99|59$بِمَا|about what|96|113|43$عَمِلُواْ|they did,|79|113|6052$وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم|and We will surely make them taste|256|290|13900$مِّنْ|of|50|84|53$عَذَابٍ|a punishment|108|125|7871$غَلِيظٍ|severe.|71|71|8561$

4269.verse: وَإِذَآ|And when|85|113|96$أَنْعَمْنَا|We bestow favor|133|190|10509$عَلَى|upon|63|120|52$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ|man,|90|147|10510$أَعْرَضَ|he turns away -|127|155|10511$وَنَـَٔـا بِجَانِبِهِۦ|and distances himself;|168|190|15333$وَإِذَا|but when|82|127|96$مَسَّهُ|touches him|100|145|10514$ٱلشَّرُّ|the evil,|74|119|10515$فَذُو|then (he is) full|122|144|15334$دُعَآءٍ|(of) supplication|128|354|15335$عَرِيضٍ|lengthy.|96|322|15336$

4271.verse: سَنُرِيهِمْ|Soon We will show them|181|189|15337$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs|83|98|1344$فِى|in|48|63|89$ٱلْأَفَاقِ|the horizons|101|116|15338$وَفِىٓ|and in|62|77|487$أَنفُسِهِمْ|themselves|94|109|1025$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|72|526$يَتَبَيَّنَ|becomes clear|115|134|1640$لَهُمْ|to them,|77|116|98$أَنَّهُ|that it|62|101|267$ٱلْحَقُّ‌ۗ|(is) the truth.|112|151|268$أَوَلَمْ|Is (it) not|85|124|2346$يَكْفِ|sufficient|81|100|15339$بِرَبِّكَ|concerning your Lord,|164|180|10281$أَنَّهُۥ|that He|70|101|2697$عَلَىٰ|(is) over|76|107|52$كُلِّ|all|49|80|185$شَىْءٍ|things|69|100|186$شَهِيدٌ|a Witness?|92|108|2562$

4265.verse: To him [alone] is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is [no longer] among us any witness [to that]."

4266.verse: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape.

4267.verse: Man is not weary of supplication for good [things], but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing.

4268.verse: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is [due] to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and [even] if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment.

4269.verse: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication.

4270.verse: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension?"

4271.verse: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?

4272.verse: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.
